message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 40
LSTMs 3
The key of these NN is the cell state
acts like a conveyor belt: information easily flow along it 
unchanged
LSTM can remove or add information to the cell state 
regulated by structures called gates
composed out of a sigmoid neural net layer and a pointwise 
multiplication operation
a value of zero in the gate output means “let nothing through,” 
while a value of one means “let everything through!”
40
speaker: SYSTEM
